TopicTitle: Not a strictly KSP issue: graphics glitches on my i7 iMac w/Yosemite

Articles.Content:
I've spent the last few days messing around with my Mac, as I get intermittent colored squares (metapixels, maybe 16x16 regular pixels?). At first I thought it was overheating, but it happens upon sleep wake as well sometimes. I booted off a Mountain Lion thumb drive, and I saw it only once. Thinking it might be cold solder joins on the GPU... has anyone had theirs reflowed? Worth it? Baking?
